casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
John Robert POTTS. No. 197P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, for Potts. Douglas A. Johnston, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th day of April 2007 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd day of August 2007."
